Class RPS

java.lang.Object
helpers.Game
games.RPS
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class RPS
extends Game
This is a multi player Rock Paper Scissors program.

    • hasPlayerWon

      public void hasPlayerWon​(java.lang.String user1Move, java.lang.String user2Move)
      Returns whether the player has/have won. A player wins if their play beats their opponent's. Increments player's wins by 1.
      Parameters:
      user1Move - player 1's move (r, p, or s)
      user2Move - player 2's move (r, p, or s)
